column1: '''Tolkien on Tolkien''' is the title of a newspaper article published in [[Diplomat, October 1966
column2: ''Diplomat'', New York, vol. 18, no. 197]] (October [[1966]]). The article is a text composed from elements contained in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s autobiographical statement prepared for [[Houghton Mifflin]]<ref group="note">Printed in {{L
column3: 165}}.</ref> and three paragraphs from [[Letter to Nancy Smith (Christmas 1963)

column1: Tolkien on Tolkien is analyzed in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]:'' ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Reader's Guide]]'' (by [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]]).<ref>[http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1288&forum=9&post_id=6416#forumpost6416 "Tolkien on Tolkien"] (forum thread) at [http://www.tolkienguide.com/ Tolkien's Collector's Guide] (accessed 6 February 2010)</ref>
